verses.verse: "Arise, <S%H6965><s%> shine; <S%H215><s%> for your light <S%H216><s%> has come, <S%H935><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is risen on you. <S%H2224><s%>

For, <S%H2822><s%> behold, darkness shall cover <S%H3680><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and gross darkness <S%H6205><s%> the peoples; <S%H3816><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will arise <S%H2224><s%> on you, <S%H3519><s%> and his glory shall be seen on you. <S%H7200><s%>
Nations <S%H1471><s%> shall come <S%H1980><s%> to your light, <S%H216><s%> and kings <S%H4428><s%> to the brightness <S%H5051><s%> of your rising. <S%H2225><s%>

"Lift up <S%H5375><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> all around, <S%H5439><s%> and see: <S%H7200><s%> they all gather themselves together, <S%H6908><s%> they come <S%H935><s%> to you; <S%H1121><s%> your sons shall come <S%H935><s%> from far, <S%H7350><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be carried <S%H539><s%> in the arms. <S%H6654><s%>

Then you shall see <S%H7200><s%> and be radiant, <S%H5102><s%> and your heart <S%H3824><s%> shall thrill <S%H6342><s%> and be enlarged; <S%H7337><s%> because the abundance <S%H1995><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall be turned <S%H2015><s%> to you, <S%H2428><s%> the wealth of the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall come to you. <S%H935><s%>

The multitude <S%H8229><s%> of camels <S%H1581><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> you, <S%H1070><s%> the dromedaries of Midian <S%H4080><s%> and Ephah; <S%H5891><s%> all they from Sheba <S%H7614><s%> shall come; <S%H935><s%> they shall bring <S%H5375><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> and frankincense, <S%H3828><s%> and shall proclaim <S%H1319><s%> the praises <S%H8416><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

All the flocks <S%H6629><s%> of Kedar <S%H6938><s%> shall be gathered together <S%H6908><s%> to you, <S%H352><s%> the rams of Nebaioth <S%H5032><s%> shall minister <S%H8334><s%> to you; <S%H5927><s%> they shall come up with acceptance <S%H7522><s%> on my altar; <S%H4196><s%> and I will glorify <S%H6286><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of my glory. <S%H8597><s%>
"Who are these who fly <S%H5774><s%> as a cloud, <S%H5645><s%> and as the doves <S%H3123><s%> to their windows? <S%H699><s%>

Surely the islands <S%H339><s%> shall wait <S%H6960><s%> for me, <S%H591><s%> and the ships of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> first, <S%H7223><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> from far, <S%H7350><s%> their silver <S%H3701><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> with them, <S%H8034><s%> for the name of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and for the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> because he has glorified you. <S%H6286><s%>

"Foreigners <S%H5236><s%> shall build up <S%H1129><s%> your walls, <S%H2346><s%> and their kings <S%H4428><s%> shall minister <S%H8334><s%> to you: <S%H7110><s%> for in my wrath I struck <S%H5221><s%> you, <S%H7522><s%> but in my favor have I had mercy on you. <S%H7355><s%>

Your gates <S%H8179><s%> also shall be open <S%H6605><s%> continually; <S%H8548><s%> they shall not be shut <S%H5462><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> nor night; <S%H3915><s%> that men may bring <S%H935><s%> to you the wealth <S%H2428><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and their kings <S%H4428><s%> led captive. <S%H5090><s%>

For that nation <S%H1471><s%> and kingdom <S%H4467><s%> that will not serve <S%H5647><s%> you shall perish; <S%H6><s%> yes, <S%H1471><s%> those nations shall be utterly <S%H2717><s%> wasted. <S%H2717><s%>

"The glory <S%H3519><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to you, <S%H1265><s%> the fir tree, the pine, <S%H8410><s%> and the box tree <S%H8410><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> to beautify <S%H6286><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of my sanctuary; <S%H4720><s%> and I will make the place <S%H4725><s%> of my feet <S%H7272><s%> glorious. <S%H3513><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of those who afflicted <S%H6031><s%> you shall come <S%H1980><s%> bending <S%H7817><s%> to you; <S%H5006><s%> and all those who despised you shall bow themselves down <S%H7812><s%> at the soles <S%H3709><s%> of your feet; <S%H7272><s%> and they shall call <S%H7121><s%> you The city <S%H5892><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> The Zion <S%H6726><s%> of the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"Whereas <S%H8478><s%> you have been forsaken <S%H5800><s%> and hated, <S%H8130><s%> so that no man passed through <S%H5674><s%> you, <S%H7760><s%> I will make you an eternal <S%H5769><s%> excellency, <S%H1347><s%> a joy <S%H4885><s%> of many <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>

For brass <S%H5178><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> and for iron <S%H1270><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> silver, <S%H3701><s%> and for wood <S%H6086><s%> brass, <S%H5178><s%> and for stones <S%H68><s%> iron. <S%H1270><s%> I will also make <S%H7760><s%> your officers <S%H6486><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%> your ruler. <S%H5065><s%>

Violence <S%H2555><s%> shall no more be heard <S%H8085><s%> in your land, <S%H776><s%> desolation <S%H7701><s%> nor destruction <S%H7667><s%> within your borders; <S%H1366><s%> but you shall call <S%H7121><s%> your walls <S%H2346><s%> Salvation, <S%H3444><s%> and your gates <S%H8179><s%> Praise. <S%H8416><s%>

The sun <S%H8121><s%> shall be no more your light <S%H216><s%> by day; <S%H3119><s%> neither for brightness <S%H5051><s%> shall the moon <S%H3394><s%> give light <S%H216><s%> to you: <S%H3068><s%> but Yahweh will be to you an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> light, <S%H215><s%> and your God <S%H430><s%> your glory. <S%H8597><s%>

Your sun <S%H8121><s%> shall no more go down, <S%H935><s%> neither shall your moon <S%H3391><s%> withdraw <S%H622><s%> itself; <S%H3068><s%> for Yahweh will be your everlasting <S%H5769><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> and the days <S%H3117><s%> of your mourning <S%H60><s%> shall be ended. <S%H7999><s%>

Your people <S%H5971><s%> also shall be all righteous; <S%H6662><s%> they shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> the branch <S%H5342><s%> of my planting, <S%H4302><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of my hands, <S%H3027><s%> that I may be glorified. <S%H6286><s%>

The little one <S%H6996><s%> shall become a thousand, <S%H505><s%> and the small one <S%H6810><s%> a strong <S%H6099><s%> nation; <S%H1471><s%> I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, will hasten <S%H2363><s%> it in its time. <S%H6256><s%>"
